013package org.apache.juneau.bean.swagger;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.marshaller.*;
026
027/**
028 * A limited subset of JSON-Schema's items object.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * The Items Object is a limited subset of JSON-Schema's items object for Swagger 2.0. It is used by parameter 
032 * definitions that are not located in "body" to describe the type of items in an array. This is particularly useful 
033 * for query parameters, path parameters, and header parameters that accept arrays.
034 *
035 * <h5 class='section'>Swagger Specification:</h5>
036 * <p>
037 * The Items Object supports the following fields from JSON Schema:
038 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
039 *    <li><c>type</c> (string, REQUIRED) - The data type. Values: <js>"string"</js>, <js>"number"</js>, <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"boolean"</js>, <js>"array"</js>
040 *    <li><c>format</c> (string) - The format modifier (e.g., <js>"int32"</js>, <js>"int64"</js>, <js>"float"</js>, <js>"double"</js>, <js>"date"</js>, <js>"date-time"</js>)
041 *    <li><c>items</c> ({@link Items}) - Required if type is <js>"array"</js>. Describes the type of items in the array
042 *    <li><c>collectionFormat</c> (string) - How multiple values are formatted. Values: <js>"csv"</js>, <js>"ssv"</js>, <js>"tsv"</js>, <js>"pipes"</js>, <js>"multi"</js>
043 *    <li><c>default</c> (any) - The default value
044 *    <li><c>maximum</c> (number), <c>exclusiveMaximum</c> (boolean), <c>minimum</c> (number), <c>exclusiveMinimum</c> (boolean) - Numeric constraints
045 *    <li><c>maxLength</c> (integer), <c>minLength</c> (integer), <c>pattern</c> (string) - String constraints
046 *    <li><c>maxItems</c> (integer), <c>minItems</c> (integer), <c>uniqueItems</c> (boolean) - Array constraints
047 *    <li><c>enum</c> (array) - Possible values for this item
048 *    <li><c>multipleOf</c> (number) - Must be a multiple of this value
049 * </ul>
050 *
051 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
052 * <p class='bjava'>
053 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
054 *    Items <jv>items</jv> = <jsm>items</jsm>(<js>"string"</js>).minLength(2);
055 *
056 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
057 *    String <jv>json</jv> = Json.<jsm>from</jsm>(<jv>items</jv>);
058 *
059 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
060 *    <jv>json</jv> = <jv>items</jv>.toString();
061 * </p>
062 * <p class='bjson'>
063 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
064 *    {
065 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"string"</js>,
066 *       <js>"minLength"</js>: 2
067 *    }
068 * </p>
069 *
070 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
071 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2/#items-object">Swagger 2.0 Specification &gt; Items Object</a>
072 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/2-0/describing-parameters/">Swagger Describing Parameters</a>
073 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger2</a>
074 * </ul>
075 */
076@FluentSetters
077public class Items extends SwaggerElement {
078
079   private static final String[] VALID_TYPES = {"string", "number", "integer", "boolean", "array"};
080   private static final String[] VALID_COLLECTION_FORMATS = {"csv","ssv","tsv","pipes","multi"};
081
082   private String
083      type,
084      format,
085      collectionFormat,
086      pattern,
087      ref;
088   private Number
089      maximum,
090      minimum,
091      multipleOf;
092   private Integer
093      maxLength,
094      minLength,
095      maxItems,
096      minItems;
097   private Boolean
098      exclusiveMaximum,
099      exclusiveMinimum,
100      uniqueItems;
101   private Items items;  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
102   private Object _default;  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
103   private Set<Object> _enum;  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
104
105   /**
106    * Default constructor.
107    */
108   public Items() {}
109
110   /**
111    * Copy constructor.
112    *
113    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
114    */
115   public Items(Items copyFrom) {
116      super(copyFrom);
117
118      this.collectionFormat = copyFrom.collectionFormat;
119      this._default = copyFrom._default;
120      this._enum = copyOf(copyFrom._enum);
121      this.exclusiveMaximum = copyFrom.exclusiveMaximum;
122      this.exclusiveMinimum = copyFrom.exclusiveMinimum;
123      this.format = copyFrom.format;
124      this.items = copyFrom.items == null ? null : copyFrom.items.copy();
125      this.maximum = copyFrom.maximum;
126      this.maxItems = copyFrom.maxItems;
127      this.maxLength = copyFrom.maxLength;
128      this.minimum = copyFrom.minimum;
129      this.minItems = copyFrom.minItems;
130      this.minLength = copyFrom.minLength;
131      this.multipleOf = copyFrom.multipleOf;
132      this.pattern = copyFrom.pattern;
133      this.ref = copyFrom.ref;
134      this.type = copyFrom.type;
135      this.uniqueItems = copyFrom.uniqueItems;
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Make a deep copy of this object.
140    *
141    * @return A deep copy of this object.
142    */
143   public Items copy() {
144      return new Items(this);
145   }
146
147
148   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
149   public Items strict() {
150      super.strict();
151      return this;
152   }
153
154   /**
155    * Sets strict mode on this bean.
156    *
157    * @param value
158    *    The new value for this property.
159    *    <br>Non-boolean values will be converted to boolean using <code>Boolean.<jsm>valueOf</jsm>(value.toString())</code>.
160    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> (interpreted as <jk>false</jk>).
161    * @return This object.
162    */
163   @Override
164   public Items strict(Object value) {
165      super.strict(value);
166      return this;
167   }
168
169   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
170   // Properties
171   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172
173   /**
174    * Bean property getter:  <property>collectionFormat</property>.
175    *
176    * <p>
177    * Determines the format of the array if type array is used.
178    *
179    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
180    */
181   public String getCollectionFormat() {
182      return collectionFormat;
183   }
184
185   /**
186    * Bean property setter:  <property>collectionFormat</property>.
187    *
188    * <p>
189    * Determines the format of the array if type array is used.
190    *
191    * @param value
192    *    The new value for this property.
193    *    <br>Valid values:
194    *    <ul>
195    *       <li><js>"csv"</js> (default) - comma separated values <c>foo,bar</c>.
196    *       <li><js>"ssv"</js> - space separated values <c>foo bar</c>.
197    *       <li><js>"tsv"</js> - tab separated values <c>foo\tbar</c>.
198    *       <li><js>"pipes"</js> - pipe separated values <c>foo|bar</c>.
199    *    </ul>
200    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
201    * @return This object.
202    */
203   public Items setCollectionFormat(String value) {
204      if (isStrict() && ! ArrayUtils.contains(value, VALID_COLLECTION_FORMATS))
205         throw new BasicRuntimeException(
206            "Invalid value passed in to setCollectionFormat(String).  Value=''{0}'', valid values={1}",
207            value, Json5.of(VALID_COLLECTION_FORMATS)
208         );
209      collectionFormat = value;
210      return this;
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Bean property getter:  <property>default</property>.
215    *
216    * <p>
217    * Declares the value of the item that the server will use if none is provided.
218    *
219    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
220    *    <li class='note'>
221    *       <js>"default"</js> has no meaning for required items.
222    *    <li class='note'>
223    *       Unlike JSON Schema this value MUST conform to the defined <c>type</c> for the data type.
224    * </ul>
225    *
226    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
227    */
228   public Object getDefault() {
229      return _default;
230   }
231
232   /**
233    * Bean property setter:  <property>default</property>.
234    *
235    * <p>
236    * Declares the value of the item that the server will use if none is provided.
237    *
238    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
239    *    <li class='note'>
240    *       <js>"default"</js> has no meaning for required items.
241    *    <li class='note'>
242    *       Unlike JSON Schema this value MUST conform to the defined <c>type</c> for the data type.
243    * </ul>
244    *
245    * @param value
246    *    The new value for this property.
247    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
248    * @return This object.
249    */
250   public Items setDefault(Object value) {
251      _default = value;
252      return this;
253   }
254
255   /**
256    * Bean property getter:  <property>enum</property>.
257    *
258    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
259    */
260   public Set<Object> getEnum() {
261      return _enum;
262   }
263
264   /**
265    * Bean property setter:  <property>enum</property>.
266    *
267    * @param value
268    *    The new value for this property.
269    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
270    * @return This object.
271    */
272   public Items setEnum(Collection<Object> value) {
273      _enum = setFrom(value);
274      return this;
275   }
276
277   /**
278    * Bean property setter:  <property>enum</property>.
279    *
280    * @param value
281    *    The new value for this property.
282    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
283    * @return This object.
284    */
285   public Items setEnum(Object...value) {
286      return setEnum(Arrays.asList(value));
287   }
288
289   /**
290    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>enum</property>.
291    *
292    * @param value
293    *    The new value for this property.
294    *    <br>String values can be JSON arrays.
295    * @return This object.
296    */
297   public Items addEnum(Object...value) {
298      setEnum(setBuilder(_enum).sparse().add(value).build());
299      return this;
300   }
301

308      return exclusiveMaximum;

576    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
577    * @return This object.
578    */
579   public Items setPattern(String value) {
580      pattern = value;
581      return this;
582   }

608   /**
609    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
610    *
611    * <p>
612    * The internal type of the array.
613    *
614    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
615    */
616   public String getType() {
617      return type;
618   }
619
620   /**
621    * Bean property setter:  <property>type</property>.
622    *
623    * <p>
624    * The internal type of the array.
625    *
626    * @param value
627    *    The new value for this property.
628    *    <br>Valid values:
629    *    <ul>
630    *       <li><js>"string"</js>
631    *       <li><js>"number"</js>
632    *       <li><js>"integer"</js>
633    *       <li><js>"boolean"</js>
634    *       <li><js>"array"</js>
635    *    </ul>
636    *    <br>Property value is required.
637    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
638    * @return This object.
639    */
640   public Items setType(String value) {
641      if (isStrict() && ! ArrayUtils.contains(value, VALID_TYPES))
642         throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid value passed in to setType(String).  Value=''{0}'', valid values={1}", value, Json5.of(VALID_TYPES));
643      type = value;
644      return this;
645   }

653      return uniqueItems;
654   }

657    * Bean property setter:  <property>uniqueItems</property>.
658    *

662    * @return This object.
663    */
664   public Items setUniqueItems(Boolean value) {
665      uniqueItems = value;
666      return this;
667   }
668
669   // <FluentSetters>
670
671   // </FluentSetters>
672
673   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
674   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
675      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
676      return switch (property) {
677         case "collectionFormat" -> toType(getCollectionFormat(), type);
678         case "default" -> toType(getDefault(), type);
679         case "enum" -> toType(getEnum(), type);
680         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> toType(getExclusiveMaximum(), type);
681         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> toType(getExclusiveMinimum(), type);
682         case "format" -> toType(getFormat(), type);
683         case "items" -> toType(getItems(), type);
684         case "maximum" -> toType(getMaximum(), type);
685         case "maxItems" -> toType(getMaxItems(), type);
686         case "maxLength" -> toType(getMaxLength(), type);
687         case "minimum" -> toType(getMinimum(), type);
688         case "minItems" -> toType(getMinItems(), type);
689         case "minLength" -> toType(getMinLength(), type);
690         case "multipleOf" -> toType(getMultipleOf(), type);
691         case "pattern" -> toType(getPattern(), type);
692         case "$ref" -> toType(getRef(), type);
693         case "type" -> toType(getType(), type);
694         case "uniqueItems" -> toType(getUniqueItems(), type);
695         default -> super.get(property, type);
696      };
697   }
698
699   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
700   public Items set(String property, Object value) {
701      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
702      return switch (property) {
703         case "collectionFormat" -> setCollectionFormat(Utils.s(value));
704         case "default" -> setDefault(value);
705         case "enum" -> setEnum(listBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
706         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> setExclusiveMaximum(toBoolean(value));
707         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> setExclusiveMinimum(toBoolean(value));
708         case "format" -> setFormat(Utils.s(value));
709         case "items" -> setItems(toType(value,Items.class));
710         case "maximum" -> setMaximum(toNumber(value));
711         case "maxItems" -> setMaxItems(toInteger(value));
712         case "maxLength" -> setMaxLength(toInteger(value));
713         case "minimum" -> setMinimum(toNumber(value));
714         case "minItems" -> setMinItems(toInteger(value));
715         case "minLength" -> setMinLength(toInteger(value));
716         case "multipleOf" -> setMultipleOf(toNumber(value));
717         case "pattern" -> setPattern(Utils.s(value));
718         case "$ref" -> setRef(Utils.s(value));
719         case "type" -> setType(Utils.s(value));
720         case "uniqueItems" -> setUniqueItems(toBoolean(value));
721         default -> {
722            super.set(property, value);
723            yield this;
724         }
725      };
726   }
727
728   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
729   public Set<String> keySet() {
730      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
731         .addIf(collectionFormat != null, "collectionFormat")
732         .addIf(_default != null, "default")
733         .addIf(_enum != null, "enum")
734         .addIf(exclusiveMaximum != null, "exclusiveMaximum")
735         .addIf(exclusiveMinimum != null, "exclusiveMinimum")
736         .addIf(format != null, "format")
737         .addIf(items != null, "items")
738         .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
739         .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
740         .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
741         .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
742         .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
743         .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
744         .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
745         .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
746         .addIf(ref != null, "$ref")
747         .addIf(type != null, "type")
748         .addIf(uniqueItems != null, "uniqueItems")
749         .build();
750      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
751   }
752
753   /**
754    * Resolves any <js>"$ref"</js> attributes in this element.
755    *
756    * @param swagger The swagger document containing the definitions.
757    * @param refStack Keeps track of previously-visited references so that we don't cause recursive loops.
758    * @param maxDepth
759    *    The maximum depth to resolve references.
760    *    <br>After that level is reached, <c>$ref</c> references will be left alone.
761    *    <br>Useful if you have very complex models and you don't want your swagger page to be overly-complex.
762    * @return
763    *    This object with references resolved.
764    *    <br>May or may not be the same object.
765    */
766   public Items resolveRefs(Swagger swagger, Deque<String> refStack, int maxDepth) {
767
768      if (ref != null) {
769         if (refStack.contains(ref) || refStack.size() >= maxDepth)
770            return this;
771         refStack.addLast(ref);
772         Items r = swagger.findRef(ref, Items.class).resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth);
773         refStack.removeLast();
774         return r;
775      }
776
777      if (items != null)
778         items = items.resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth);
779
780      return this;
781   }
782}
